scripts.go-update-patch:
echo '-------------------------------------------
Update version (PATCH) and deploy to npm...
-------------------------------------------
' && npm run confirm && npm version patch && npm run publish-to-npm
scripts.go-update-minor:
echo '-------------------------------------------
Update version (MINOR) and deploy to npm...
-------------------------------------------
' && npm run confirm && npm version minor && npm run publish-to-npm
scripts.go-update-major:
echo '-------------------------------------------
Update version (MAJOR) and deploy to npm...
-------------------------------------------
' && npm run confirm && npm version major && npm run publish-to-npm
scripts.publish-to-npm:
npm i && npm run test && npm publish --access public && echo '
SUCCESS!
'
